CustomField.formula: AND( ISBLANK(Parent.Id), Record_Type__c = "Prospect", Account_Transfer_Cooldown_Date__c <= TODAY(), Owner.User_Caseified_ID__c = "0056g000004oHyPAAU", NOT(ISPICKVAL(status__c, "Disqualified")), PMS_Integration_Is_Supported__c = TRUE, ISPICKVAL(organization_type__c, "Dental Practice") )
CustomField.label: Is Sales Assignable - SMB
